Title: WinRT LineChart
Description: Customizable line chart component for everyone to use in his/her own Windows 8 App
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Customizable line chart component for everyone to use in his/her own Windows 8 App

Features:

  • Multiple Series
  • Add Serie
  • Guidelines
  • X and Y values
  • Serie data 'shifting'
  • Add point to serie (dynamic chart)
